name: Lloyd Dean CLAYTON, petitioner, v. William STEPHENS, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Lloyd Dean CLAYTON, petitioner,
v.
William STEPHENS, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division.

opinions.text: Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperisdenied. Petitioner allowed until October 27, 2014, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.

casebody.head_matter:
Lloyd Dean CLAYTON, petitioner,
v.
William STEPHENS, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division.
No. 13-10442.
Supreme Court of the United States
Oct. 6, 2014.
Opinion
